body.name: 2 Pack Air Purifiers for Bedroom,5 Layers H13 HEPA Air Filter, 22db Quiet Air Purifiers for Home Pets,Desktop,Kitchen,Filter 99.99% Smoke,Pollen, Pet Dander,Dust, Ozone Free, Available for California

features: 【Recommend 2 Pack Air Purifiers】One Air Purifier for bedroom or baby room to filter dust, pollen. Another Air Purifier for pets in living room, small&medium room to filter pet dander,odor,hair. HEPA Air Purifiers for home with 5 Layers Filter(Ultra fine pre-filter, Double Silver Coating, H13 True HEPA Filter, Activated Carbon Filter) Filter 0.3 micron airborne contaminants, smoke &VOC, keep the air fresh around you. Our home air purifier refresh 5x per hour in 183 ft²,up to 915 ft² in one hour.

【Quiet for Sleep & Child Lock】Set your air purifier to sleep mode, the room air purifier will run at a silently noise level of lower than 22dB, quiet enough to refresh your room air at night, brings you a better experience during your sleeping, especially for baby and kid. Besides, the child lock effectively prevents errors caused by pets or kids.

【2/4/8H Timer & 3 Wind Speed】The air purifiers for bedroom is easy to set up and pretty quiet when it's operating, even on the highest wind speed. The HEPA air purifier design 3 speed function (sleep, medium, high) and 2/4/8 hours time settings for energy saving. Gonrair desktop air purifier perfect for pet owners, babies, smokers, the elderly, fits in bedrooms, living rooms, offices, nurseries, kitchens and basements.

【Portable Air Purifiers for Pets】The air purifiers with adapter packed inside the filter, enjoy fresh air everywhere as long as connect the power or power bank. The air cleaning design with handle, flexible adjustment as you need. Besides, the air purifier handle can be used as bracket, then the fresh air comes! Gonrair air purifiers for home will protect you and your family forever!

【Available for California】100% Ozone Free,ETL,CE,ROHS,PSE,CARB certification to ensure your safe. If you have any question about Gonrair air purifiers, please feel free to contact our customer service. 【Note for Replacement Filters】 Please remove the plastic wrap from the filter before use. For best performance, replace the HEPA filter about 3-6 MONTHS. Search“B0BC7FYVLP”or Gonrair GL-K802 filter to get replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Purifies Five Times An Hour
reviews.reviewText: Air purifiers are useful for cleaning your home's air, managing humidity, reducing your exposure to air pollution, and generally keeping your home's air clean. They function by drawing air through one or more filters, trapping various impurities, and then re-circulating the cleaner air back into the room via a fan.My son's room has two dogs and an occasional smoker, so the air quality was poor, and it was hurting how I felt in my own home. I decided to give an air purifier a shot and hope for the best. This one is tiny enough to fit on his bedside table and is just what was needed.The purifier has a True Hepa five-layer filter, which is a key feature in these devices. The filter contains an activated carbon filter, which aids in the removal of pollen, smoke, pet dander, and air pollution. Purifying a 183-square-foot room takes only 12 minutes and can be done five times every hour.I like how easy it is to set up and how quiet it is because the schoolroom and office are right next to his room. It offers three speeds to choose from as well as energy-saving features. It's well-made, looks nice, works well, and is reasonably priced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Functionality wise - I live with family of 7 and the air always feel stuffy and congested. After purchasing this unit, it has helped a lot with our breathing and we recently had forest fire and this filter does its JOB! We can feel the difference! I opened the filter and can see that its trapping particles.Unit is small and easy to carry from room to room and place it at specific location and it is quiet and very important for light sleeper like me. I’ve tried many models throughout the year, this one seems to work the best for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Air purifier for my house.
reviews.reviewText: I live in a house with 3 furry pets and have been considering getting a purifier for sometime now. I purchased these because it came as a set of 2 and has overall good reviews.I don’t know how to accurately rate these because honestly I do not know if they are actually purifying my house. I can tell you they are very quiet. If you’re putting one in your bedroom it is a very quiet hum. It does have a blue light it emits while on, so if you like pitch dark in your room, there is no way to shut this light off (without turning the machine on)After about a week of being constantly on, I shut it off to see what the filter looks like. It was still just as clean as when I first purchased it. Maybe that’s normal.Personally, I like having them running, and am glad I am using them.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars i love it
reviews.reviewText: i love iti feel fresh and clean airand i have 2 cat at homeand don’t make noise

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the three speeds on the fan, including the sleep mode. I like the 360 degree multi stage(5) pleated filter rather than a 3” opening with 3-4 varying sponge filters layered in. I like the running time choices although I plan to leave it running constantly. What I didn’t like was the box that had been opened multiple times and haphazardly taped back with plugs and wires still attached. This unit was sold as new, not used. Obviously they both were in good working condition so that was just a matter of presentation, but still.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and light-weighted
reviews.reviewText: Pretty small, very light, super quiet. Easy to use, all function keys are on the top of this little yet mighty machine, no hidden feature keys. Since it’s really light-weighted it’s easy for me to carry and move it to different rooms when needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful results. Great for small spaces
reviews.reviewText: I truly am so thankful I found this , I got this for my bedroom cause my husband and I both have allergies and we both are coughing and sneezing at night so much. I didn’t want anything big and bulky cause I have a small bedroom. This is actually adorable the size is perfect, it’s so quiet, nicely designed. I love the handle that is equipped with l; I can easily cart it around to different parts of the house depending on our needs.. it’s amazingly lightweight. It auto turns off after 8 hours which is nice. It definitely has helped us both so much, I will be getting one for my office at work cause their is quite a few smokers so this will hopefully help with that. Absolutely recommend this .
